Monster ID7403

The Repugnant spectre is a superior variant of the normal deviant spectre. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master. They are found exclusively within the Catacombs of Kourend.

Prayer info[edit | edit source]

Repugnant spectre
Level required 40
Prayer XP78 xp
TypeSpectral creature
Required toolEctoplasmator

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 186,062 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Repugnant spectre kill is worth 72,194.77.

The average Repugnant spectre kill while on a Konar task is worth 74,894.4.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The repugnant spectre was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variant.
